lyrics.stanza: Jesus Lord, I long For Your embrace To taste Your kisses sweeter than wine, To know the love that surpasses all time, To feel the joy when I am in Your arms, Precious One.
Jesus Lord, I'm charmed By Your mercy And I rejoice that You've chosen me To be with You in eternity But until then keep me close to Thee, Lovely One.
